snippet: The authorities say that a New Jersey mechanic offered to pay an officer, now accused of planning to cook and eat women, to kidnap a woman on his behalf.
abstract: Michael Vanhise of Hamilton, NJ, is charged with kidnapping conspiracy in Federal District Court in Manhattan; he is accused of offering to pay New York City Police Officer Gilberto Valle, who has been accused of planning to abduct, rape, cook and eat women,  to kidnap a woman on his behalf.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say that a New Jersey mechanic offered to pay an officer, now accused of planning to cook and eat women, to kidnap a woman on his behalf.

headline.seo: Man Accused of Conspiring With Officer to Kidnap Woman
headline.main: Man Accused of Conspiring to Kidnap a Woman
headline.print_headline: Man Accused of Conspiring With Officer to Kidnap Woman
